DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate level progesterone luteal phase various stimulation follicular phase treatment GnRH antagonist protocol follow GnRHagonist induction ovulation .
DOC.brief_title: The Luteal Phase After GnRHa Trigger - Proof Concept Study
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study investigate level progesterone luteal phase various stimulation follicular phase treatment GnRH antagonist protocol follow GnRHagonist induction ovulation . Furthermore aim explore whether luteal phase support small daily bolus hCG without administration exogenous P , maintain good reproductive outcome .
DOC.criteria: woman age 25 40 SerumFSH serumLH level 12 IU/L Length period 25 34 day BMI 18 30 less 2 ovary uterine abnormality PCOS ULPCO ( 11 follicle 12 mm 1 ovary
